fulltext:
DAO DONG DUC 
(+84) 909 13 17 12 
Email: blakice12@gmail.com | Skype: blakice12 
EDUCATION
2011 - 2017 University of Information Technology, Vietnam National University - Ho Chi Minh 
City 
Certifications Bachelor of Engineering in Information System 
GPA: 8.14/10 
TOEIC (ETS): 830/990 
WORKING EXPERIENCES 
5/2017 - Present Komit Consulting (Odoo Partner) - Team Leader 
6/2016 - 4/2017 Trobz (Odoo Partner) - Technical Consultant 
2/2016 - 5/2017 Younet Media - Research and Development 
8/2015 - 10/2015 Trobz (Odoo Partner) - Intern Developer 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Programming Languages: Python, XML, C#, SQL 
Framework: Odoo: Strong knowledge about native Odoo modules, writing unit test for 
modules, migrating database by OpenUpgrade to new version 
.NET: Main platform for almost all projects at University 
Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, Microsoft SQL Server 
Other: OS: Windows, Linux/Unix (Ubuntu / MacOS) 
Tools: git, linux shell 
Knowledge of debugging software, especially Python. 
Basic knowledge about Docker, VPS (Digital Ocean, Heroku...). 
Deploy Odoo instances 
OOP - Design Patterns: Singleton, Adapter, Composite, Factory… 
Knowledge about Hackintosh 
Activities: Open Source: Member of OCA (Odoo Community Association) 
Contributes to OCA repositories: Migrations, code review, fixing issues, creating 
new modules. Github: https://github.com/novawish 
1/3 
PROJECTS 
Younet Media (https://www.younetmedia.com) - Research and Development 
Graduation thesis project: Key phrases extraction for Social Media Monitoring System 
Description: Written in Python with NLP (Natural Processing Language) feature: Extract top-mentioned 
words on Social Media in a period of time to see what is the trend of Vietnamese. 
Tools using: nltk, VN tokenizer, boost (C++ library to compile for Python-using), redis (for 
ranking words)... 
Result: Defended successfully at university with score 8.1/10 
Trobz (https://trobz.com) - Odoo Technical Consultant 
ALWIN http://www.alwin.com 
A manufacturing company, they produce many kinds of towel and soap dispensers products 
in order to export to America and Europe. 
Description: Customize MRP (Material Requirements Planning) module to adapt customer’s needs: 
●
Multi-step routes for manufacturing 
●
Rework Manufacturing Orders 
●
Spare products 
PuratosGP http://www.puratosgrandplace.com 
They produce cocoa-based products, they have many stock warehouses throughout Vietnam 
Description: Main module is Inventory Management, customer has specific needs for stock module: 
●
Inventory Summary Report: Show all stock movements from all locations 
Manuchar https://manuchar.com 
A logistic company, provides warehousing services at harbor. 
Description: Mostly depends on customized modules: 
●
Truck Management 
●
Integration with 3PL, Weighing system 
Internal projects TFA (Company’s Financial Management), TMS (Projects and requirements management), 
Blooming Lotus (creates Odoo modules on Web Interface) 
Description: Fix bugs and develop new features 
Komit Consulting (https://komit-consulting.com) - Odoo Team Leader 
DRCOM https://www.drcomgroup.com 
Marketing agency specialized in medical communication 
2/3 
Description: 
●
Main modules: Sales, CRM, Project Management, TImesheet, HR 
●
Migration from Odoo Version 6.0 Community to 11.0 Enterprise 
●
OpenLDAP Integration 
●
Designing a completely different UI from Odoo 
Main responsibility: 
●
Analysis and implementation 
●
Manage tasks and allocate to team members 
●
Code review and training members 
●
QC and Customer support 
Banh Vang https://banhvang.com 
Manufacturing company for industrial bakery 
Description: 
●
Main modules: Inventory, Manufacturing, Sales, Purchase. Invoicing 
●
Customize MRP module to adapt factory's production flow 
●
Synchronize invoicing data between Odoo and FAST accounting by Excel 
Main responsibility: 
●
Analysis and implementation 
●
Manage tasks and allocate to team members 
●
Code review and support members 
●
Organize customer training sessions 
Parasol Co. https://www.parasolco.com 
US Company sells baby products like diapers, tissues... 
Descrition: 
●
Main modules: Sales, Inventory, Purchase 
●
Integration with Shopify e-commerce by 3rd party module 
●
Integration with UPS (delivery service) by 3rd party module 
Main responsibility: 
●
Analysis and implementation 
●
Work with 3rd party to customize the connectors 
●
Code review and support members 
●
QC and support customer 
Outsourced 
Projects 
Partners are mostly European companies: Finland, France. 
●
Migration from Odoo 7.0 to 11.0 
●
Analysis and implementation 
●
Bugs fixing 
●
Code review and QC 
Internal Projects 
●
Project management: Ticket management, project development 
●
Payroll system: Salary structures for Vietnamese and foreign employees 
●
Accounting management: Viettel E-Invoice connector - Using Viettel API to 
integrate invoicing data between Odoo and Viettel’s e-invoice service 
Company  activities 
●
Organize experience-sharing sessions about Odoo features and technical knowledge 
●
Organize OCA workshops: Contribute to Odoo Community 
●
Organize Odoo training course for newcomers 
3/3
